channel.title: Procrastination on Josiah King
channel.description: Recent content in Procrastination on Josiah King

item.title: 'Sometimes a scream is better than a thesis'
item.description:
This is a pretty light-hearted first blog post. No doubt as time goes on, I’ll attempt to write about more useful things, but I thought I would kick things off with what basically amounts to some self-congratulatory shouting of “Look, I did a thing!”.
Back in the middle of the second year of my PhD (by which point I’d written a small amount already), I thought it would be fun to track my wordcount over the course of writing up (this was really just a means of procrastinating one morning instead of writing).
